nodes.text: Galactic grits was a type of food served at Dex's Diner, before the destruction of the restaurant, which took place during the Galactic Empire's first two years. The grits were served at the diner as a breakfast side with a price of 2.5 credits.
A type of breakfast food, galactic grits could be eaten by members of the Besalisk species.

Galactic grits were one of many foods discovered and enjoyed by Dexter Jettster during his life, many years of which he spent traveling around the galaxy. The dish was served by the Besalisk chef at Dex's Diner at some point before the restaurant's destruction during the first two years of the reign of the Galactic Empire. At the diner, which Jettster operated in CoCo Town on the planet Coruscant, the grits were served as a breakfast side that cost 2.5 credits.

Galactic grits were featured in "Dining at Dex's," a 2009 StarWars.com Hyperspace article written by Gregory Walker in the form of an in-universe menu for Dex's Diner. In his blog, Walker stated that he included food with what he termed "space-y" names to have fun and go along with food names from previous works of science fiction.
